com.soa.console.binding

Interface BindingWizardRenderer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface BindingWizardRenderer
extends java.io.Serializable
    The BindingRenderer is a template interface for displaying binding specific content in a wizard that is used by the Governance Console. If implementation not provided, the user will be unable to add a Binding of the given type without importing it from a WSDL document.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContentLocation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Render binding specific content given the context and return a location where this content can be found.
      java.lang.String getType()
      Returns an String identifier for the type of WSDL binding.
      void processContents(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Process request to model binding specific information in WSDL Binding element found in the context.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns an String identifier for the type of WSDL binding. The identifier is used to identify bindings of this type in the system. It is also used as a key for looking up binding specific labels and messages in the system's resource bundle.
        Returns:
        String identifier for the type of binding, i.e., "soap1.1/http".

      • getContentLocation

        java.lang.String getContentLocation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                             throws GException
        Render binding specific content given the context and return a location where this content can be found. Binding context can be retrieved using BindingContextLoader.getBindingContext(HttpServletRequest) API.
        Parameters:
        reqeust - HTTP servlet request containing binding context with WSDL Binding element as well binding context information like service name, interface name and binding name.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GException

      • processContents

        void processContents(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
              throws GException
        Process request to model binding specific information in WSDL Binding element found in the context. Optionally, perform validation of binding specific information. Request contains context containing binding WSDL Binding element as well binding context information like service name. Binding context can be retrieved using BindingContextLoader.getBindingContext(HttpServletRequest) API. On successful validation, model binding specific information in WSDL Binding element using WSDL Binding element extensibility framework.
        Parameters:
        request - containing binding specific information submitted.
        Throws:
        GException - when validation fails of binding specific information.
